value.name: Coodo Pay
value.detail: A premium payment system built for freelance developer and website owner which can help you manage payment, user, product, order, email, disaccount and data.

value.name: Koodo Reader
value.detail: A modern eBook manager and reader that helps you read epub, pdf, mobi, azw3 and txt files on Windows, macOS, Linux and Web

value.name: Website for Koodo Reader
value.detail: use Next.js for server rendering, Bootstrap for responsive layout and i18n for internationlization
value.description: A website built with Next.js and Bootstrap

value.name: Profolio
value.detail: Built with Gatsby.js, suitable for developers and designers
